text: Rampur State was a 15 gun-salute Princely state of British India. It is now a state of India. Rapur came into existence on 7 October 1774. It was created by a treaty with Oudh, The state gained independence in 1949. It was the first Princely state to accede in India. ==References== Category:Indian princely states Category:1774 establishments Category:18th-century establishments in India Category:1770s establishments in Asia Category:1947 disestablishments in India
title: Rampur State
